tool.name: tRNA and tmRNA

param.name: genbank_gencode
param.label: Genetic code
param.option: 4. Mold, Protozoan, and Coelenterate Mitochondrial Code and the Mycoplasma/Spiroplasma Code
6. Ciliate, Dasycladacean and Hexamita Nuclear Code

param.name: topology
param.label: Topology
param.option: Assume that each sequence has a circular topology
Assume that each sequence has a linear topology

param.name: mtRNA
param.label: Search for Metazoan mitochondrial tRNA genes (-mt)
param.help: -i switch ignored. Composite Metazoan mitochondrial genetic code used.

param.name: mam_mtRNA
param.label: Search for Mammalian mitochondrial tRNA genes (-mtmam)
param.help: -i switch ignored. -tv switch set. Mammalian mitochondrial genetic code used.

param.name: introns
param.label: Search for tRNA genes with introns in anticodon loop ...

tool.help:
**What it does**
Aragorn_ predicts tRNA (and tmRNA) in nucleotide sequences.
.. _Aragorn: http://mbio-serv2.mbioekol.lu.se/ARAGORN/
-----
**Example**
Suppose you have the following nucleotide sequences::
>SQ Sequence 8667507 BP; 1203558 A; 3121252 C; 3129638 G; 1213059 T; 0 other; cccgcggagcgggtaccacatcgctgcgcgatgtgcgagcgaacacccgggctgcgcccg ggtgttgcgctcccgctccgcgggagcgctggcgggacgctgcgcgtcccgctcaccaag cccgcttcgcgggcttggtgacgctccgtccgctgcgcttccggagttgcggggcttcgc cccgctaaccctgggcctcgcttcgctccgccttgggcctgcggcgggtccgctgcgctc ccccgcctcaagggcccttccggctgcgcctccaggacccaaccgcttgcgcgggcctgg ....
